SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AAA.boardSeq desc) number , AAA.* , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_BOARD_FILE WHERE BOARD_SEQ = AAA.boardSeq) fileCnt FROM ( SELECT BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , CUST_ID custId , READ_CNT readCnt , USER_NAME userName , TITLE title , CONTENT content , CONVERT(CHAR(19), REGDATE, 20) regdate , REGID regid , CONVERT(CHAR(19), EDITDATE, 20) editdate , EDITID editid , USE_YN useYn , POP_SDATE popSdate , POP_EDATE popEdate , POP_YN popYn , BOARD_TARGET boardTarget FROM T_BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND BOARD_TARGET LIKE '%' + #{custTypeCode} + '%' AND GETDATE() BETWEEN POP_SDATE AND POP_EDATE + ' 23:59:59'
AND ${select} LIKE '%'+ #{value} +'%'
) AAA ) AA WHERE number BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY number ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) retCnt FROM T_BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND BOARD_TARGET LIKE '%' + #{custTypeCode} + '%' AND GETDATE() BETWEEN POP_SDATE AND POP_EDATE + ' 23:59:59'
AND ${select} LIKE '%'+ #{value} +'%'

SELECT BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , CUST_ID custId , READ_CNT readCnt , USER_NAME userName , TITLE title , CONTENT content , CONVERT(CHAR(19), REGDATE, 20) regdate , REGID regid , CONVERT(CHAR(19), EDITDATE, 20) editdate , EDITID editid , USE_YN useYn , POP_SDATE popSdate , POP_EDATE popEdate , POP_YN popYn , BOARD_TARGET boardTarget FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

WITH FILE_LIST(FILES) AS ( SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT FILES + 1 FROM FILE_LIST WHERE FILES +1 <=3 ) SELECT FILES files , B.FILE_SEQ fileSeq , B.BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , B.FILE_TYPE_CODE fileTypeCode , B.FILE_NAME fileName , B.FILE_PATH filePath , B.FILE_SIZE fileSize , B.MIME_TYPE mimeType , B.REGDATE regdate , B.REGID regid , B.FILE_REAL_NAME fileRealName , B.F_NO fNo FROM (SELECT * FROM FILE_LIST) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_BOARD_FILE WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}) B ON A.FILES = B.F_NO

SELECT FILE_SEQ fileSeq , BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , FILE_TYPE_CODE fileTypeCode , FILE_NAME fileName , FILE_PATH filePath , FILE_SIZE fileSize , MIME_TYPE mimeType , REGDATE regdate , REGID regid , FILE_REAL_NAME fileRealName , F_NO fNo FROM T_BOARD_FILE WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
SELECT TOP 1 WITH TIES BOARD_SEQ boardSeq FROM T_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC
